questions.question: Under acidic condition, litmus paper turns to..............

explanations.a: Litmus turns from blue to colorless in acidic conditions
explanations.b: Correct: Litmus turns from blue to red in acidic conditions
explanations.c: Litmus doesn't turn from red to colorless in acidic conditions
explanations.d: Litmus doesn't turn from red to blue in acidic conditions

questions.question: In a titration experiment, 20mL of HCl was needed to completely neutralize 40mL of 0.10 mol/L NaOH. What was the concentration of the acid?

explanations.a: This would require more acid than was actually used
explanations.b: This concentration is too low for the given volumes
explanations.c: This doesn't match the stoichiometry of the reaction
explanations.d: Correct: Using the formula M1V1 = M2V2, the concentration is 0.2 mol/L

questions.question: The characteristic properties of an acid is due to the presence of ...............

explanations.a: Correct: Acids produce hydronium ions (H3O+) in solution
explanations.b: Oxide ions are characteristic of basic oxides, not acids
explanations.c: Hydroxide ions are characteristic of bases, not acids
explanations.d: Hydride ions are not responsible for acidic properties
